menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Pork Tenderloin
menu_items.description: Our pork loins are closely hand-trimmed and rubbed with mikey’s own dry rub blend. They are then slowly smoked for 24 hours over glowing embers of ozark hickory wood. They’re virtually fat-free, completely boneless and fully cooked. Just warm gently on the grill, or in the oven or microwave to enhance their irresistible smoky flavor. Vacuum-packed. (1 lb. )

menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Boneless Turkey Breast
menu_items.description: We start out with birds specially bred for abundant white meat, these plump breasts are carefully boned and slowly smoked over glowing ozark hickory wood for 12 hours. These plump boneless breasts are moist and tender and make for a unforgettable meal. Low in salt… no water or brine added.

menu_items.name: "The Jim Bob" BBQ Tuna
menu_items.description: We were wanting to do something special for our friends on tlc’s “19 kids and counting.” we took jim bob’s idea of BBQ tuna and took it to the next level. We only use fresh albacore tuna and give it a light hickory smoke, then adding our secret BBQ recipe making a amazingly tasty treat.

menu_items.name: Boneless Deep Fried Turkey Breast
menu_items.description: Our boneless deep fried turkey breast has gained in popularity. One reason for this is that folks would rather not jump in at the deep end and fry a whole turkey. Around here, folks prefer to buy our turkey breast and cut it to single portion sizes. Our boneless deep fried turkey breast is all white breast meat that is superbly tender and retains its juiciness under a crisp and tender skin. Why not try one for your next holiday meal.

menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Cheddar Cheese
menu_items.description: Our‎ hickory smoked cheese is one of mikey’s favorites. We make this smoked cheese in our own smokehouse! It is lightly smoked to create an even more distinctive look and one of a kind flavor. Serve on a sandwich, or combined with your favorite crackers and dip.

menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Swiss Cheese
menu_items.description: Our hickory smoked cheese is one of mikey’s favorites. We make this smoked swiss cheese in our own smokehouse. It is lightly hickory smoked to create an even more distinctive look and one of a kind flavor. Complement any serving of our fine smokehouse meats with a slice or two of this remarkably creamy and lightly smoked swiss cheese.

menu_items.name: Cherry Smoked Beef Brisket
menu_items.description: Our beef brisket starts out as a choice trimmed grade a piece of beef. We then hand-rub mikey’s dry rub spice blend leaving us with a perfect flavoring to this juicy cut of beef. Slowly smoked for 18 hours, this brisket is fully cooked and ready to serve to 16 or more of your hungry friends!

menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Baby Back Ribs
menu_items.description: The best in the ozarks. These st. louis style ribs are extra-juicy fall off the bone good. We hand select our ribs and apply a light shake of mikey’s dry rub, then hickory smoke our ribs until they are tender and juicy. Before we remove them from the smokehouse we apply a light BBQ sauce which we cook onto the ribs forming a rich flavored bark. These tender, extra-juicy ribs will please even the most particular rib lover in your family. So don’t forget to order extra for yourself!

menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Slab Bacon
menu_items.description: After trying some of this fresh hickory smoked bacon, you will never go buy from a supermarket again. We have extra-lean slabs of bacon, slowly cured and then hickory smoked. Makes a wonderful special gift, too!

menu_items.name: Hickory Smoked Whole Turkey
menu_items.description: We start with plump turkeys and then apply mikey’s special blend of spices throughout. Then, we smoke these beautiful birds for 12 hours over glowing embers of ozark hickory wood. The result is a moist, tender taste delight you can enjoy as a centerpiece attraction for your holiday dinner. Our fully cooked smoked turkey is ready to warm for dinner. Say goodbye to endless hours in the kitchen and let mikey do the cooking for you. Ideal as a tasteful gift, too. Low in salt… no water or brine added.

B.L.T.
menu_items.description: The sub that proves great things come in threes. In this case, those three things happen to be crisp bacon, lettuce and juicy tomato. While there is no scientific way of proving it, this B.L.T might be the most perfect sub in existence.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham
menu_items.description: Simply delicious. This flavorful sandwich is packed with lean Black Forest ham and served on your favorite freshly baked bread, like 9 grain wheat or Italian. All this mouthwatering greatness for less than 6g of fat. Can not beat that

menu_items.name: Buffalo Chicken
menu_items.description: Good things are hard to come by. That's why we've brought the Buffalo Chicken back for good! All that cool, creamy ranch, poured over tender glazed buffalo chicken. Get it as a delicious Footlong sub!

menu_items.name: Chicken and Bacon Ranch Melt
menu_items.description: Saddle up and try the fresh toasted subway chicken and bacon ranch sandwich. Stuffed with melted monterey cheddar cheese, tender all-white meat chicken, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, onions and green peppers.

menu_items.name: Cold Cut Combo
menu_items.description: Can't decide what kind of meat you want? Get them all. The cold cut combo is stacked with turkey-based meats - ham, salami and bologna. It's topped with crisp vegetables and served on freshly baked bread. This combo has a little bit of everything.

menu_items.name: Italian B.M.T.
menu_items.description: An Italian masterpiece with Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, and black forest ham. Add your favorite veggies on your choice of freshly baked bread and get ready to enjoy.

menu_items.name: Meatball Marinara
menu_items.description: We take Italian style meatballs, drench them in mangialicious marinara sauce, and then serve ëem on your favorite freshly baked bread with your choice of crisp veggies. Buon appetito!

menu_items.name: Oven Roasted Chicken
menu_items.description: Oven roasted to perfection and piled high atop freshly baked bread with your favorite toppings from spicy jalapenos to crisp green peppers or whatever you like. With all this juicy flavor, your taste buds won't believe it has 6g of fat.

menu_items.name: Roast Beef
menu_items.description: This tasty number, with less than 6g of fat, is piled high with lean roast beef and your choice of fresh veggies, like crisp green peppers and juicy tomatoes. Want to take it up a notch? Try it with some spicy jalapenos for a kick in the taste buds.

menu_items.name: Spicy Italian
menu_items.description: Go ahead, spice up your life. Served on your favorite freshly baked bread and toasted to perfection, the spicy Italian features spicy pepperoni and sensational salami. Try one today with everything else your taste buds desire.

menu_items.name: Steak and Cheese
menu_items.description: Back by popular demand, the steak and cheese is here to stay. The two most elemental, irresistible ingredients in the world - piled high onto freshly baked bread and your choice of crisp veggies.

menu_items.name: Subway Club
menu_items.description: Tender sliced turkey, lean roast beef and tasty Black Forest ham come together with your choice of fresh veggies for a low-fat flavor fiesta. Try it today on freshly baked bread and experience all the deliciously for 6 grams of fat

menu_items.name: Subway Melt
menu_items.description: Imagine freshly baked bread stuffed with tender sliced turkey, ham, crispy bacon, melted cheese, and your choice of tasty vegetables and condiments. Now, stop imagining and get your mouth over to your nearest Subway Restaurant.

menu_items.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
menu_items.description: This gourmet specialty is a flavorful blend of tender teriyaki glazed chicken strips and our own fat-free sweet onion sauce. Served hot and toasted on freshly baked bread. A taste so big, you won't believe it has less than 6g of fat

menu_items.name: The Big Philly Cheesesteak
menu_items.description: The Big Philly Cheesesteak is every meat lover's dream. With lots of steak smothered in melted cheese, it's easy to see why this classic is the taste that Philly is so proud of.

menu_items.name: Tuna
menu_items.description: Our tasty tuna sandwich is simply sumptuous. Flaked tuna, mixed with mayo, and your choice of fresh vegetables, this local favorite can be built to suit your craving.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast
menu_items.description: Get flavor without the flab when you try this American classic. Dive into tender turkey breast piled sky-high with everything from lettuce and tomatoes to banana peppers, maybe even jalapenos if you're feeling spicy.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast and Black Forest Ham
menu_items.description: A sandwich so deliciously hearty, you won't know you're eating low fat. Enjoy the flavor of tender sliced turkey breast and Black Forest ham with your favorite veggies from juicy tomatoes to sweet red onions served on your favorite freshly baked bread.

menu_items.name: Tuscan Chicken Melt
menu_items.description: All the flavors of tuscany in the palm of your hand. This delicious sub is loaded with tender, juicy chicken tossed in zesty herb seasoning, then fresh toasted with melty cheese on your choice of bread. It is topped with a tasty balsamic vinaigrette. With just 8 grams of fat on a 6in sub, itís healthy and tastes great. Or, try it as a 6.00 Footlong Special.

menu_items.name: Veggie Delite
menu_items.description: Crispy, crunchy and classically delicious. The Veggie Delite is tangible proof that a sandwich can be high in flavor without being high in fat. Try a delicious combination of lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, black olives and onions with your choice of fat-free condiments on freshly baked bread.

This delicious sub is loaded with tender, juicy chicken tossed in zesty herb seasoning, then fresh toasted with melty cheese on your choice of bread. It's topped with a tasty balsamic vinaigrette. With just 8 grams of fat on a 6î sub, itís healthy and tastes great. Or, try it as a $6.00 Footlong Special.

menu_items.name: Chopped Salads
menu_items.description: We're taking salad to a new level. Now, you can make any 6î sub or double meat sub a chopped salad. Try your favorite as a chopped salad today.

menu_items.name: Kids - Veggie Delite
menu_items.description: You no longer have to sacrifice nutrition or flavor when you're short on time. Choose a Mini sub (Black Forest Ham, Turkey Breast or Roast Beef) and pair it with fresh apple slices. Add a 1% low fat white milk to wash it down and you have a better-for-them meal that kids will love.

menu_items.name: Apple Slices
menu_items.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side and drink. Our sides run from salty to sweet and from fit to indulgent. With such a variety of drinks to choose from, there's truly something for every taste.

menu_items.description: Enjoy​ the delicious taste of our new yogurt parfait, made with sweet, juicy strawberries, crunchy granola and smooth, creamy yogurt. It's the perfect treat for breakfast, lunch or any time of day.

menu_items.name: Bacon, Egg and Cheese
menu_items.description: Start your day in a sizzlin' way with crispy bacon, egg and melty cheese on fresh toasted Flatbread or whatever you like. It's hard to imagine this trio of tasty ingredients could get even better, but just wait till you try it with everything from juicy tomatoes to spicy jalapenos for a full on flavor free-for-all.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham, Egg and Cheese
menu_items.description: Enjoy savory Black Forest Ham, melted cheese, and egg whites all on a fresh toasted English muffin. Add your choice of toasty veggies for a tasty way to start the day! Try this Breakfast Melt with egg white on 3" flatbread to make it a Fresh Fit breakfast sandwich!

menu_items.name: Breakfast B.M.T. Melt
menu_items.description: Fluffy egg whites, Black Forest ham, salami and spicy pepperoni come together with bubbly melted cheese for a morning masterpiece worthy of the breakfast hall of fame. Try it today on a hot toasted light wheat English muffin with all your favorite crisp veggies.

menu_items.name: Egg and Cheese
menu_items.description: A classic for a reason. Our egg and cheese is simply delicious. Enjoy a fluffy egg omelet with melted cheese fresh toasted on freshly baked bread. It's unbeatable. Try it with egg white on 3" flatbread or English Muffin to make it a Fresh Fit breakfast sandwich!

menu_items.name: Steak, Egg and Cheese
menu_items.description: No matter what side of the bed you wake up on, you'll love this. Yummy egg with tender and delicious steak. All covered in melty cheese on freshly baked bread. Oh, what a beautiful breakfast. Try it with egg white on 3" flatbread or English Muffin to make it a Fresh Fit breakfast sandwich!

menu_items.name: Sunrise Subway Melt
menu_items.description: Rise and shine to a delightfully delicious breakfast of tender turkey, crispy bacon, Black Forest ham and fluffy egg white under a blanket of bubbly melted cheese. Try one today on hot toasted flatbread with your choice of tasty veggies.

menu_items.description: This‎ is a festive dish prepared with the utmost care and patience. A succulent mixture of sundried peppers, spices, nuts, seeds, herbs, and cocoa beans are combined to create this uniquely dark dish. Poured over tender breast of chicken and toasted sesame seeds.

menu_items.text: Don't deprive yourself of a truly delicious burger. Drive in to your nearest SONIC®, push the red button and tell 'em you want one of those extraordinarily tasty, doesn't-taste-like-fast-food, fast-food burgers. Then prepare to be delighted. Select a menu item below.

menu_items.name: SONIC® Cheeseburger
menu_items.description: What you see is what you get. Melty American cheese, crinkle-cut pickles, chopped onions, fresh shredded lettuce and ripe tomatoes on a perfectly seasoned, 100% pure beef patty with your choice of mustard, mayo or ketchup. Straightforward and tasty, just the way it should be.

menu_items.name: SuperSONIC® Cheeseburger
menu_items.description: Double the SONIC® goodness with the SuperSONIC® Cheeseburger. Two perfectly seasoned 100% pure beef patties topped with crinkle-cut pickles, chopped onions, fresh shredded lettuce and ripe tomatoes with your choice of mustard, mayo or ketchup. Seeing double has never been tastier.

menu_items.name: Jr. Burger
menu_items.description: Proof that you don't have to be big and fancy to be SONIC® good. A juicy, 100% pure beef patty, crinkle-cut pickles, mustard and ketchup. Simple but delicious.

menu_items.name: SONIC® Bacon Cheeseburger
menu_items.description: Everything you ever wanted in a cheeseburger with bacon. A juicy, 100% pure beef patty sandwiched between melty American cheese, crispy bacon, fresh shredded lettuce, ripe tomatoes and creamy mayo. Kick your burger cravings to the curb with the SONIC® Bacon Cheeseburger.

menu_items.name: SuperSONIC® Bacon Double Cheeseburger
menu_items.description: Bacon makes everything better - especially when it's as good as our SuperSONIC® Double Cheeseburger. We start with two quarter-pound, 100% pure beef hamburgers, two melty slices of American cheese, lettuce, fresh sliced tomatoes, creamy mayo, and top it all off with crispy bacon.

menu_items.name: Bacon Cheeseburger TOASTER® Sandwich
menu_items.description: Get your beef and cheese sandwiched between two thick slices of Texas Toast. Then top it off with crinkle-cut pickles, chopped onions, fresh shredded lettuce, ripe tomatoes, a freshly prepared onion ring and hickory BBQ sauce. It's the ultimate burgwich.

menu_items.text: Our versions of the classics. Hot dogs have never been better. Select a menu item below.

menu_items.name: Footlong Quarter Pound Coney
menu_items.description: We can't help make summer last longer, but we can stretch out your delicious Coney. Our new Footlong Quarter Pound Coney is a juicy, plump footlong hot dog topped with warm chili and melty cheese.

menu_items.name: Chili Cheese Coney
menu_items.description: Want something filling that's also a great deal? Try SONIC's Premium Beef Chili Cheese Coney. It's a grilled beef hot dog made with 100% pure beef and topped with warm chili and melty cheddar cheese served in a soft, warm bakery bun.

menu_items.name: Chicago Dog
menu_items.description: Got love for the Windy City? Then try SONIC's Premium Beef Chicago Dog. A beef hot dog made with 100% pure beef and topped with pickle, relish, tomato, sport peppers, celery salt and mustard all served up in a soft, warm poppy seed bun.

menu_items.name: Corn Dog
menu_items.description: Simple food at its finest. A delicious hot dog surrounded in sweet corn batter and fried to a crispy golden brown. Try it with some mustard or ketchup if you want. It's like hot dog utopia on a stick.

menu_items.name: New York Dog
menu_items.description: Get a taste of the Big Apple with SONIC's Premium Beef New York Dog. A beef hot dog made with 100% pure beef and grilled to perfection and topped with spicy brown mustard, grilled onions and crunchy sauerkraut in a soft, warm bakery bun.

menu_items.name: All-American Dog
menu_items.description: Take a bite out of Americana with SONIC's Premium Beef All-American Dog. It's a beef hot dog made with 100% pure beef that's grilled to perfection and topped with ketchup, yellow mustard, relish and chopped onions and served in a soft, warm bakery bun.

menu_items.text: You can't go wrong with chicken. Especially when it's as good as this. There's a lot to choose from too, so don't hesitate to go a little crazy. Select a menu item below.

menu_items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
menu_items.description: 100% all white meat grilled chicken breast topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes and mayonnaise served on a wheat bun made with whole grain. *Wheat bun contains 10 grams of whole grain.

menu_items.name: Chicken Wrap
menu_items.description: Grilled all white meat chicken breast, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes and light ranch dressing all wrapped up in a warm flour tortilla. Like a delicious pocket of goodness just waiting for you to take it home.

menu_items.name: Chicken Club TOASTER® Sandwich
menu_items.description: A true original. Three tender, juicy all white meat chicken strips between two thick slices of Texas Toast. Add to it crispy bacon, melty cheese, fresh shredded lettuce, ripe tomatoes and creamy mayo and you've got quite the conversation piece. If you can even talk with that much delicious food in your mouth.

menu_items.name: Jumbo Popcorn Chicken®
menu_items.description: Enjoy a crispy snack, or put together the perfect combo meal with our Jumbo Popcorn Chicken,® made with juicy all white meat. Choose from ranch, goney mustard or Hickory BBQ dipping sauce.

The all-new Hickory Flatmelt Sandwiches come with your choice of marinated sirloin steak, grilled or crispy all-white meat chicken breast with crisp bacon, cheddar cheese, hickory BBQ sauce, and grilled onions wrapped up in a soft, warm flatbread.

menu_items.description: Come taste BBQ flavor that'll make your mouth jump off your face to say thank you. menu_items.text: We serve our entire menu all day—so feel free to pull the ol' breakfast for dinner switcheroo if the mood strikes. Anything you want is fine by us. Select a menu item below.

menu_items.name: Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: How do we get this much SONIC® goodness into a simple breakfast burrito? Maybe it's magic. Or maybe it's just the right amount of scrambled egg, cheese and either bacon or sausage wrapped up in that warm flour tortilla. We'll let you figure it out for yourself.

menu_items.name: Ultimate Meat and Cheese Breakfast Burrito™
menu_items.description: Breakfast doesn't get better than the all-new ultimate meat and cheese breakfast burrito™ with crispy bacon, savory sausage, golden tots, fluffy eggs and melty cheddar cheese, all wrapped in a warm flour tortilla.

menu_items.name: Steak and Egg Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: Put a stake in your hunger with the new steak and egg breakfast burrito. Savor each bite of marinated sirloin steak, golden tots, melty cheddar cheese and fluffy eggs, all wrapped in a warm flour tortilla.

menu_items.name: Smoked Chipotle Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: Say good morning to your mouth. Introducing the all-new smoked chipotle breakfast burrito. Combining sirloin steak, smoked chipotle sauce, jalapeños, grilled onions, golden tots, fluffy eggs and melty cheddar cheese, it's the only reason not to hit snooze in the morning.

menu_items.name: French Toast Sticks (4)
menu_items.description: Three's a crowd, and four is a delicious bundle of breakfast delight. At least when it comes to our thick, golden French toast sticks-complete with maple-flavored syrup for dipping.

menu_items.name: SuperSONIC® Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: Let the big flavor of the SuperSONIC® breakfast burrito get you out of bed. A medley of savory sausage, scrambled egg, melty cheese, tater tots, diced onions, ripe tomatoes and spicy jalapeños all wrapped up in a warm flour tortilla. It'll sing to your taste buds. Which, if you ask us, is a pretty cool way to start your morning.

menu_items.name: Fiesta Steak Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: It's not just breakfast. It's a breakfast-fiesta with the new fiesta steak breakfast burrito. Stuffed with seasoned carne asada, jalapeños, tomatoes, golden tots, melty cheese and fluffy eggs all wrapped in a flour tortilla and served with a wedge of fresh lime.

menu_items.name: Zesty Cheesesteak Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: The all-new zesty cheesesteak breakfast Burritos are like tiny alarm clocks for your mouth. Combining marinated sirloin steak, zesty cheese sauce, grilled onions, golden tots, fluffy eggs and melty cheddar cheese. Because breakfast should be more Mmmm than Zzzz.

menu_items.name: Breakfast Toaster®
menu_items.description: How'd you like to open your eyes and see warm, fluffy Egg, melty Cheese and your choice of Sausage or Bacon all stacked up on thick Texas Toast? Then try a BREAKFAST TOASTER® Sandwich. It's the wake-up call of wake-up calls.

menu_items.name: CroisSONIC® Breakfast Sandwich*
menu_items.description: Egg and melted American cheese on a soft, buttery* croissant with your choice of sausage or bacon.

menu_items.description: Talk about bang for your buck; this beefy burger has it all. A juicy, 100% pure beef, junior-size patty topped with fresh shredded lettuce, ripe tomato, chopped onion, crinkle-cut pickles and your choice of ketchup, mustard or mayo.

menu_items.name: Jr. Deluxe Cheeseburger
menu_items.description: The perfect snack to satisfy your cravings. 100% pure beef jr. hamburger topped with melty American cheese, with lettuce, fresh-sliced tomato, diced onions and pickles.

menu_items.name: Jr. Double Cheeseburger
menu_items.description: A classic American icon made with Sonic style. Two 100% pure beef jr. hamburgers topped with two thick slices of melty American cheese, with ketchup, mustard and pickles.

menu_items.name: Chicken Strip Sandwich
menu_items.description: Who knew so little could get you so much? Two tender, juicy all white meat chicken strips topped with fresh shredded lettuce and creamy mayo. It's the epitome of value.

menu_items.name: Corn Dog
menu_items.description: Simple food at its finest. A delicious hot dog surrounded in sweet corn batter and fried to a crispy golden brown. Try it with some mustard or ketchup if you want. It's like hot dog utopia on a stick.

menu_items.name: Grilled Cheese
menu_items.description: The delicious cheesy concoction all kids know and love. Two thick slices of Texas toast with classic melted American cheese.

menu_items.name: Jr. Breakfast Burrito
menu_items.description: Sausage, eggs and cheese, oh my! The Jr. Breakfast Burrito is packed with savory sausage, fluffy eggs and melty cheese, and all wrapped up in a warm flour tortilla. Value tastes good, doesn't it?

menu_items.name: Small Tots
menu_items.description: Pop some of these crispy little potato pieces in your mouth and you'll never think of a spud the same way again. They're only a buck.

menu_items.name: Small Fries
menu_items.description: Crispy, golden brown sticks of potato goodness. Get 'em with your combo or on their own. You can even smother them with warm chili and cheese. But who are we to tell you how to eat?

menu_items.name: Vanilla Cone
menu_items.description: Simple and sweet. Cold, creamy, real vanilla ice cream in a cone.

menu_items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
menu_items.description: Creamy, real vanilla ice cream with hot fudge, whipped topping and a maraschino cherry. It's hard to top. Unless you want nuts on it. That is pretty easy to do.

menu_items.name: Small Famous Slush
menu_items.description: So good, they're famous. That's probably all you need to know. Oh, and this one's only a buck.

menu_items.name: Small Soft Drink
menu_items.description: Feel like cooling down and refreshing with a SONIC® good soft drink? We know the feeling. We're told the secret is our famous SONIC® ice. But you didn't hear that from us.

Drink Coffee, Save Money
menu_items.description: T's january 15, so you have likely broken half of your new year's resolutions already. Want a new one that fits your latte loving lifestyle & saves you money? Buy a travel mug & use it at red rock. We give you a quarter discount on any drink you get in the mug. A $15 mug pays for itself in 60 visits.60 sound like a lot of trips? If you're here every weekday, you should break even by mid-april, then save yourself another $45 over the rest of the year.

menu_items.name: Coffee Tastings
menu_items.description: Red‎ rock hosts coffee tastings as a way to share our passion for coffee w/ our customers. We hope to help you grow in your appreciation for tasting coffee, talking about it, brewing coffee, & maybe even drinking it black. Come check one out, whether you think you're a coffee newbie or "that snob" in your respective social group. The schedule through may is as follows

menu_items.name: February 2
menu_items.description: Brew methods

menu_items.name: March 9
menu_items.description: Coffee tasting 101

menu_items.name: April 13
menu_items.description: Coffee tasting 101

menu_items.name: May 18
menu_items.description: Espresso tasting

menu_items.name: Mas New Coffee
menu_items.description: We just added seven - count'em 7 - new coffees to our offering list. That's a lot of turnover to keep up with. We thought we'd give you a little rundown of some of the highs & really highs (there aren't any lows here)

menu_items.name: First, We Present the Latin American Coffees.
menu_items.description: The buenos aires peaberry from el salvador is toasty, lightly fruity, & chocolaty. San agustin de las canas of guatemala shows red fruit balanced by an elegant tobacco finish. Cadejo from guatemala is also highlighted by red fruit but mixes it w/ a creamy body. Samuel reyes gives us a honduran pacamara w/ great molasses body, ideal for this winter rain.

menu_items.name: Second, Here Is Our African Offer Sheet.
menu_items.description: Hawa yember hails from ethiopia w/ sweetness, clarity, & tropical fruit tones. Ndaroini is a kenyan w/ some of our favorite savory, vegetal, & herbaceous notes - think sweet clover, emphasis on the sweetness. Finally, caproca of rwanda is another fantastic, brooding coffee, deep & chocolaty for a rainy day.

menu_items.name: Stop in for a Cup or a Bag
menu_items.description: Cheers & enjoy

menu_items.name: Buy Ajejandro's Coffee
menu_items.description: Parque nacional montecristo lies near the northernmost point in el salvador, where the country adjoins guatemala & honduras. Alejandro valiente is in the fourth generation of the family that used to own all of the reserve until his siblings sold it to the government in 1987.

menu_items.name: Red Rock Hosting Farmer
menu_items.description: We are thrilled to announce a visit from one of our coffee growers. Join us at red rock on friday, september 15, at 2:30 to meet el salvadorean farmer alejandro valiente. We'll cup his coffees & hear from four barrel how they have partnered w/ him this year.

menu_items.name: So Many New Coffee
menu_items.description: We've been looking forward to the release of new coffees for so long. Now we're overwhelmed w/ our delicious new selections. We just received 3 new costa ricans, 2 el salvadorians, a guatemalan, & a new single origin decaf. I'll give you a brief run down of the highlights from each offering.

menu_items.name: Costa Rica Aserri Las Palomas
menu_items.description: A returning lot from last year. This year's lot is 100% caturra varietal & has a distinct oreo cookie flavor.

menu_items.name: Costa Rica Aserri Valverde Abarca
menu_items.description: Features caramel & orange zest.

menu_items.name: Costa Rica La Concha
menu_items.description: Is another returning lot. Again it is 100% typica varietal. The cup showcases strawberry & grape.

menu_items.name: Our 2 Current El Salvador
menu_items.description: Offerings are both from farmer alejandro valiente near the town of metapan.
